changelog:
v2.0.0 - Major Update
- Added automatic update checking system
- Completely simplified interface - removed quantity inputs and Buy All checkboxes
- Now automatically buys ALL available seeds when selected (no manual quantity setting needed)
- Improved seed layout with 3-column display for better space usage
- Streamlined buying process with optimized purchase logic
- Cleaner, more user-friendly interface
- All core automation features maintained
